name: Improved Drag
descriptionText: You are skilled at dragging foes around the battlefield.
benefitText: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a drag combat maneuver. In addition, you receive a +2 bonus on checks made to drag a foe. You also receive a +2 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense when an opponent tries to drag you.
normalText: You provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a drag combat maneuver.
